title: The Lost Gods of Easter Island

sources.title: 03 The Lost Gods Of Easter Island ( 2000)
sources.description: A simple, carved figure bought at an auction in New York leads David Attenborough on a global journey from Russia to Australia, from England back to the Pacific. On the way he delves into a history of the stunning stones on Easter Island.
